ygData.subject: RE: MASK of the deciver
ygData.msgSnippet: it works. you can type for short: /st Shada
ygData.messageBody:
it works.

you can type for short:

/st

Shada

> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

> Ladies and gents who experience this problem (I never have,
> so I can't test
> it). There is a new command implemented, called /stopsong.
> I posted it on usenet, along with all the other / commands.
> In test, it
> stopped my song exactly as if I had hit the button again. My
> guess is,
> this is an emergency fix for the "jammed" occurence.
> PLEASE test this, and verify if it works.
>
> Thank you,
> Talies the Wanderer
> <The Wandering Minstrels>
> Bristlebane
